title: Update static graph docs
body:
This is a copy of #5259 but without the fixes in #5222. If you reviewed the previous PR you don't need to review this one since it doesn't contain anything new except [this paragraph](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/compare/master...cdmihai:graphDocumentation?expand=1#diff-56917986b8224daabcae40c04c2ea44625d01232203ff2ab03c34ba24742702eR59).

Did a new PR in order to preserve the changes in the old one, just in case we'll revisit #5222.

commit.message: Remove paragraph about the fixes in #5222
